rules_text:
Menace
Whenever this creature enters or transforms into Eilert, Sun Chaser, creatures you don’t control get -1/-1 until end of turn.
At the beginning of your end step, you may pay {RG}{RG}. If you do, transform Eilert, Sun Chaser.
rules_text2:
Menace
Whenever this creature transforms into Odine, Moon Chaser, it deals damage equal to its power to target creature or planeswalker you don’t control.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may pay {B}{B}. If you do, transform Odine, Moon Chaser.
